3: Hey, you guys arrive at the right time.
I'm caught up in all these rescue missions here and I'm in over my head. Would you be able to help?
Come on. It's got to do with the Red Tide, and we can't really ask the newbies for help. I'm sure Gray Raven is a lot more experienced.
I knew I could count on the Gray Ravens.
So here's the deal: the Silk Worm Commandant and a Construct member have been engulfed by the rising tide. We've lost all contact with them.
I think it might be too late to do anything now...
One of the two remaining Constructs in their team has been assigned to a different group.
Things are a little more complicated with the other one. She wasn't there with them when their commandant was attacked, because she had been under treatment for severe injury.
She regretted not being able to save their commandant, and firmly believes that he is just too injured to contact us and that he's waiting to be rescued.
So she refused to be assigned to a different team and later escaped at night. She's also somehow blocked location tracking.
I would have asked a technician to track her down any other day, but we really need to do it ourselves now.
So? Would you be able to help?
Wonderful! Well, let me send her information to your terminal.
She's probably looking for their commandant where the Red Tide has been. Look for her in the ruins.
Ruolin, frame name Antler, Attacker Construct.
Yes, that's her. I'll leave the job to you.
